website_summaries.verdict: An attractive bib with a robust construction that not only blocks spills and messes but also prevents scalding. Well-made and highly protective.
pros: Wide and long to provide full coverage
Poly-rayon top layer absorbs spills, while the waterproof backing keeps liquids from seeping through
Snap closure doesn't snag hair and is adjustable for varying neck sizes
Safe for washing machine and dryer
cons: Snap closure can be difficult to fasten for those with arthritis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, snaps stay closed, great for Special Needs
customer_reviews.text: We have been purchasing these bibs for years for our (now) pre-teen child, we started when he was in elementary school. My point is: they're not just for grown-ups! They are long and substantial, more than adequately covering the lap, wash and dry very well, and the snaps are easy to use and stay closed. (We did also purchase some with velcro and that quickly fails, rendering the bibs useless.) I do not pre-treat these bibs and we have had no staining, plus the backing truly renders them waterproof, or at least if the terry gets wet the person wearing the bib does not. Thumbs up.
